title: Suspended/Banned
body: Hi, I got suspended this morning for using a bot to level my account however I've never used anything of that sort. This is the account in question, https://lan.op.gg/summoner/userName=tacoswillpronus on the LAN server. I get better ping to the LAN severs, thus why I switched. I don't really ever talk in chat during these games so that might've caused some sort of trigger or something since I don't understand the language all too well on LAN. That's also the reason why I'm posting it here, since I don't speak the language I thought it would be better to post this thread on the NA forums. Thanks.

replies.body: It's not likely to get hit with a scripting ban (botting) for simply not talking since I'm actually right there with you and I almost never talk since I'm focused on gameplay. You'll only see these types of bans when suspicious or malicious programs are detected running in the background. Reach out to us in a [**ticket**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new) and we can go over everything with you there.
